data.title: 50.000 Soldaten zusammengezogen: Russland plant laut Selenskij Offensive auf Sumy
data.description: Die Ukraine rechnet mit einer russischen Offensive auf die Grenzregion Sumy im Nordosten des Landes. Es werden jedoch Gegenmaßnahmen ergriffen. Der russische Verteidigungsminister gibt bekannt, dass die russischen Truppen an fast allen Frontabschnitten vorrücken.
data.translatedTitle: 50,000 soldiers brought together: According to Selenskij offensive, Russia plans to Sumy
data.translatedDescription: Ukraine expects a Russian offensive to the Sumy border region in the northeast of the country. However, countermeasures are taken. The Russian Minister of Defense announces that the Russian troops move forward to almost all front sections.

data.title: Trump: Tritt Kanada den USA bei, ist „Golden Dome“ gratis
data.description: Sollte das nördliche Nachbarland „ein eigenständiger, aber ungleicher“ Staat bleiben, werde eine Teilnahme an dem von den USA geplanten Raketenabwehrsystem 61 Milliarden US-Dollar kosten.

data.title: Doppeltes Pech für Musk: Pleite bei Starship-Testflug, Klage zugelassen
data.description: Die oberste Stufe des größten je gebauten Raketensystems erreichte zwar das All, zerbrach aber beim Wiedereintritt in die Erdatmosphäre. Unterdessen sieht sich Musks Behörde mit einer Klage konfrontiert.
data.translatedTitle: Double bad luck for Musk: bankruptcy on Starship test flight, complaint approved

Ministr Jan Lipavský si kvůli kyberútokům nechal předvolat čínského velvyslance v Praze. Na úřadu zavedl nový bezpečnější komunikační systém, uvedl.

data.title: VIDEO: Apokalyptické scény v Gaze. Lidé se hrnuli pro pomoc, desítky jich postřelili
data.description: Tisíce Palestinců v úterý večer vtrhly do středisek, kde nadace podporovaná Spojenými státy a Izraelem rozdělovala humanitární pomoc. Jeden člověk zemřel a nejméně 48 lidí bylo zraněno, většina z nich izraelskou palbou. Zoufalá snaha opatřit si jídlo převážila nad obavami Palestinců z biometrických a jiných kontrol, které Izrael v centrech slíbil zavést. OSN a řada humanitárních organizací s nadací odmítly spolupracovat s tím, že nový systém pomoci nebude účinný.
data.translatedTitle: VIDEO: Apocalyptic scenes in Gaza. People flocked for help, dozens of them shot
data.translatedDescription: Thousands of Palestinians invaded the centers on Tuesday evening, where the foundation supported by the United States and Israel distributed humanitarian aid. One person died and at least 48 people were injured, most of them by Israeli fire. The desperate effort to get food prevailed over the fears of Palestinians from biometric and other controls that Israel promised to introduce in centers. The UN and a number of humanitarian organizations refused to cooperate with the foundation with the new help system will not be effective.

data.title: Je lepší, když odpovědnost nesou obce a kraje, hájí Bek převod financování
data.description: Poslance čeká finální hlasování o tom, kdo se bude starat o financování školních kuchařek, uklízeček, školníků, účetních a dalších nepedagogických pracovníků. Ministr školství Mikuláš Bek chce, aby se o to nově místo státu staraly obce a kraje. Kategoricky s tím nesouhlasí opozice i zástupci školských odborů. Hlasovat o tom se bude v pravé poledne.
data.translatedTitle: It is better to be responsible for municipalities and regions, defend the back transfer of financing
data.translatedDescription: The deputy awaits the final vote on who will take care of the financing of school cookbooks, a cleaners, janks, accountants and other non -teaching staff. Minister of Education Mikuláš Bek wants to take care of it instead of the state. Representatives of school departments disagree categorically. It will be voted on at noon.

data.title: Konečné zrušili aukci zahozené brožurky. Prý porušovala dobré mravy, tvrdí
data.description: V minulém týdnu se předsedkyně KSČM a europoslankyně Kateřina Konečná rozhodla v internetové dražbě nabídnout brožuru, kterou v diskuzním pořadu Otázky Václava Moravce zahodila senátorka Miroslava Němcová (ODS). Jenže ve středu společnost Aukro aukci smazala. Důvodem podle Konečné bylo, že aukce prý porušuje dobré mravy.
data.translatedTitle: The final canceled the auction of a discarded brochure. She said she violated good morals, says
data.translatedDescription: Last week, the chairwoman of the KSCM and MEP Kateřina Konečná decided to offer a brochure in the internet auction, which was thrown by Senator Miroslava Němcová (ODS) in the discussion program of Václav Moravec. But in the middle, Aukro deleted the auction. The reason according to Konečná was that the auction is said to violate good morals.

data.title: Pellegrini: Politici na Slovensku neřeší problémy, vyvolávají nenávist
data.description: Politici na Slovensku neřeší skutečné problémy, nabízejí zástupná témata, která vzbuzují emoce a nenávist, řekl slovenský prezident Peter Pellegrini, jenž poprvé od loňského zvolení hlavou státu přednesl v Národní radě zprávu o stavu země. Podle něj je slovenská společnost politicky rozdělená jako nikdy ve své dosavadní historii.
data.translatedTitle: Pellegrini: Politicians in Slovakia do not solve problems, causing hatred
data.translatedDescription: Politicians in Slovakia do not solve real problems, offering surrogate topics that evoke emotions and hatred, said Slovak President Peter Pellegrini, who for the first time since last year's election of the head of state, gave the National Council a report on the state of the country. According to him, Slovak society is politically divided as never in its history.

data.title: Kradl léky, jedl figurky, měl jít na izolaci.  Postiženého vězně se zastal Ústavní soud
data.description: Ústavní soud se zastal vězně s mentálním postižením a omezenou svéprávností, kterého v břeclavské věznici chtěli přeřadit do režimu se zvýšenou ostrahou. Muž opakovaně porušoval zákon o výkonu trestu a vnitřní řád věznice, například ostatním odsouzeným kradl léky nebo polykal šachové figurky.
data.translatedTitle: He stole medication, ate figures, was to go for isolation.  The Constitutional Court was in favor of the affected prisoner
data.translatedDescription: The Constitutional Court held a prisoner with intellectual disabilities and limited legal capacity, which in Břeclav prison wanted to transfer to the regime with increased security. The man repeatedly violated the law on the execution of the sentence and the internal order of the prison, for example, stealing medicines or swallowed chess figures.

data.title: Trváme na neutralitě Ukrajiny, odmítáme důraz na územní celistvost, řekl Lavrov
data.description: Rusko trvá na neutralitě Ukrajiny a odmítá důraz Západu na obnovu její územní celistvosti, řekl ruský ministr zahraničí Sergej Lavrov. Podle něj bude brzy oznámeno další kolo přímých jednání mezi Moskvou a Kyjevem. Ukrajina se již více než tři roky brání plošné ruské vojenské agresi.
data.translatedTitle: We insist on the neutrality of Ukraine, reject the emphasis on territorial integrity, Lavrov said
data.translatedDescription: Russia insists on the neutrality of Ukraine and rejects the West to the restoration of its territorial integrity, said Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov. According to him, another round of direct negotiations between Moscow and Kiev will soon be announced. Ukraine has been defending Russian military aggression for more than three years.

data.title: TOP 09
data.description: Strana TOP 09 vznikla v roce 2009 a hned v prvních volbách zaznamenala úspěch. V jejím čele stojí od roku 2019 Markéta Pekarová Adamová, která však uvedla, že do letošních sněmovních voleb už stranu nepovede. Pravděpodobně zůstane v čele strany do listopadového sněmu TOP 09, kdy by měl být zvolen nový předseda. Preference středopravicové strany klesají, doufá však v obdobný výsledek jako ve volbách v roce 2021.
data.translatedTitle: TOP 09
data.translatedDescription: The TOP 09 party was established in 2009 and was successful in the first elections. Since 2019, Markéta Pekarová Adamová has been headed, who said that this year's parliamentary elections will no longer be a party. It will probably remain the head of the party to the November Assembly of TOP 09, when the new chairman should be elected. The preferences of the center -right parties are falling, but hopes for a similar result as in the elections in 2021.

data.title: Rusko shromažďuje 50 tisíc vojáků u Sumské oblasti, chystá rozsáhlou ofenzivu
data.description: Rusko shromažďuje přes 50 tisíc vojáků poblíž ukrajinské Sumské oblasti, ale Kyjev podnikl kroky, aby zabránil Moskvě v rozsáhlé ofenzivě v tomto regionu, uvedl ve středu ukrajinský prezident Volodymyr Zelenskyj. Sumská oblast sousedí s ruskou Kurskou oblastí, do které loni pronikly ukrajinské formace. Šéf Kremlu Vladimir Putin nedávno řekl, že ruská armáda vytváří nárazníkovou zónu podél hranic s Ukrajinou.
data.translatedTitle: Russia collects 50,000 soldiers in the Sumian region, is preparing an extensive offensive
data.translatedDescription: Russia collects over 50,000 soldiers near the Ukrainian Sum region, but Kiev took steps to prevent Moscow from a large offensive in the region, said Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenky on Wednesday. The Sum region is adjacent to the Russian Kurns region, which was penetrated last year by Ukrainian formations. Kremlin chief Vladimir Putin recently said that the Russian army creates a bumper zone along the border with Ukraine.

data.title: Mám nárok na ochranu, o zapnutí majáku nerozhoduji, píše Černochová po nehodě
data.description: Ministryně obrany Jana Černochová na sociální síti X vysvětlila využití majáku na autě, ve kterém měla v úterý odpoledne nehodu v centru Prahy. Policie v uvedla, že vůz, ve kterém politička ODS jela, používalo při jízdě výstražné zařízení, tedy maják. Podle ní o jejím využití nerozhoduje ministr, ale řidič.
data.translatedTitle: I am entitled to protection, I do not decide to turn on the lighthouse, Černochová writes after the accident
data.translatedDescription: Minister of Defense Jana Černochová on the Social Network X explained the use of a lighthouse on a car where she had an accident in the center of Prague on Tuesday afternoon. The police said that the car in which the ODS politician drove used a warning device, a lighthouse. According to her, its use is not decided by the minister, but by the driver.

data.title: Soud projednává odvolání Pelty a Kratochvílové, žalobce žádá vyšší trest
data.description: Odvolací soud se zabývá případem bývalého šéfa českého fotbalu Miroslava Pelty a někdejší náměstkyně ministerstva školství Simony Kratochvílové viněných ze zmanipulování sportovních dotací. Peltovi hrozí pět a půl roku za mřížemi, Kratochvílové šest. Podle nejvyššího státního zástupce jde v jejich případě o závažnou trestnou činnost a tresty by měly být vyšší.
data.translatedTitle: The Court presents the appeal of Pelta and Kratochvílová, the plaintiff asks for a higher sentence
data.translatedDescription: The Court of Appeal is dealing with the case of the former head of Czech football Miroslav Pelta and the former Deputy Ministry of Education Simona Kratochvílová from the manipulation of sports subsidies. Pelt threatens five and a half years behind bars, Kratochvílová six. According to the Supreme Public Prosecutor, these are serious crime and the punishments should be higher.

ner.entity: Ministry of Education Policy and Research Unit
ner.label: ORG

data.title: Babiš k důkazům o Čapím hnízdě: vše bylo transparentní, v okolí není lepší projekt
data.description: U Vrchního soudu v Praze ve středu třetím dnem pokračuje odvolací řízení v kauze Čapí hnízdo. Tentokrát se řeší pouze listinné důkazy. Šéf ANO Andrej Babiš opět na jednaní dorazil osobně, europoslankyně Jana Nagyová se omluvila. Soudkyně Eva Brázdilová už předem avizovala, že tento týden nerozhodne. Na závěrečné řeči a verdikt by mělo dojít až na konci června.
data.translatedTitle: Babiš to evidence of the Stork's Nest: Everything was transparent, there is no better project in the area
data.translatedDescription: At the High Court in Prague on Wednesday, on the third day, appeal proceedings continue in the Stork Nest case. This time only paper evidence is solved. ANO chief Andrej Babiš arrived again in person, MEP Jana Nagyová apologized. Judge Eva Brázdilová has already announced in advance that she will not decide this week. The final speech and verdict should only occur at the end of June.

data.title: Sto let po nacistech znovu na stejném místě? Berlín usiluje o pořádání olympiády
data.description: Berlín se hodlá ucházet o znovupořádání olympijských her. Zástupci německé metropole v úterý formálně představili kandidaturu na Olympijském stadionu, kde na hrách v roce 1936 organizovaných nacistickým režimem zářil Jesse Owens.
data.translatedTitle: One hundred years after the Nazis again in the same place? Berlin strives to organize the Olympics
data.translatedDescription: Berlin intends to apply for the re -organization of the Olympic Games. Representatives of the German metropolis on Tuesday formally presented the candidacy at the Olympic stadium, where Jesse Owens shone at the games in 1936 organized by the Nazi regime.

data.title: RECENZE: Svůdná a sexy. Dua Lipa Praze ukázala, jak má vypadat světový koncert
data.description: Česká koncertní premiéra zpěvačky Duy Lipa dopadla na výbornou. Po strop našlapaná O2 arena měla tu čest s absolutním popovým zážitkem. Každičký prvek byl vyladěn na maximum a vše hrálo ve prospěch celku. Hvězdou byla samozřejmě Dua Lipa, její charisma a bezvadný pěvecký výkon.
data.translatedTitle: Review: Seductive and Sexy. Dua Lipa Prague showed what a world concert should look like
data.translatedDescription: Czech concert premiere of singer Duy Lipa turned out excellent. On the ceiling, O2 Arena was honored with an absolute pop experience. Each element was tuned to the maximum and everything played in favor of the whole. Of course, the star was the duo Lipa, her charisma and a perfect singing performance.

data.title: Předražené kontejnery a polní kuchyně? Je to pseudokauza, říká šéf vyzbrojování
data.description: Česko dává na obranu nejvíc v novodobé historii. Ministerstvo obrany spravuje desítky miliard ročně a akvizice nových zbraní sleduje veřejnost i opozice s nebývalou pozorností. „Víme, za co investovat. Ale výzvou je, aby náš systém takové objemy zvládal,“ říká v Rozstřelu Lubor Koudelka, vrchní ředitel Sekce vyzbrojování a akvizic Ministerstva obrany.
data.translatedTitle: Overpriced containers and field kitchens? It's a pseudocause, says the chief of armaments
data.translatedDescription: The Czech Republic gives defense in modern history. The Ministry of Defense manages tens of billions per year and the acquisition of new weapons is monitored by the public and opposition with unprecedented attention. "We know what to invest for. But the challenge is that our system can handle such volumes," says Lubor Koudelka, Chief Director of the Armaments and Acquisitions of the Ministry of Defense.

data.title: Při nočním požáru garáží shořela čtyři auta. Hasiči evakuovali přes 40 lidí
data.description: Více než čtyři desítky lidí museli z preventivních důvodů hasiči evakuovat při nočním požáru v Třebíči. V garážích bytového domu v Okružní ulici shořely čtyři zaparkované vozy. Při požáru ani při samotném zásahu se nikdo nezranil, majetková škoda je předběžně vyčíslena na 10 milionů korun.
data.translatedTitle: In the night fire the garage burned four cars. Firefighters evacuated over 40 people
data.translatedDescription: For preventive reasons, more than forty people had to evacuate firefighters during a night fire in Třebíč. Four parked cars burned in the garages of an apartment building in Okružní Street. In the fire or during the intervention, no one was injured, the property damage is preliminarily quantified at 10 million crowns.

data.title: Ať zase voda není jako krev. Brno kvůli veletrhu vypustilo kašny v centru města
data.description: Městská část Brno-střed i správci městské zeleně vypustili některé kašny v centru Brna. Důvodem je dnešní zahájení bezpečnostních veletrhů v čele s veletrhem obranné a bezpečnostní techniky IDET. V roce 2021 totiž obarvili aktivisté na protest proti veletrhu fontány v centru Brna na červeno.
data.translatedTitle: Let the water not like blood again. Brno released fountains in the city center due to the fair
data.translatedDescription: Brno-střed and city greenery administrators released some fountains in the center of Brno. The reason is today's opening of security trade fairs headed by the Defense and Security Technology Fair IDET. In 2021, activists stained in protest against the Fountain fair in the center of Brno.

data.title: Rusové hlásí sestřelení tří set dronů, šlo o jeden z největších ukrajinských útoků
data.description: Ruské ministerstvo obrany uvedlo, že protivzdušná obrana v noci zničila bezmála 300 ukrajinských dronů nad celkem 13 oblastmi na západě země. Šlo by tak o jeden z největších ukrajinských vzdušných útoků na ruské území od začátku války. Zničení desítek bezpilotních prostředků nepřítele hlásí také Ukrajina.
data.translatedTitle: Russians reporting downing three hundred drones, one of the largest Ukrainian attacks
data.translatedDescription: The Russian Defense Ministry said that air defense destroyed nearly 300 Ukrainian drones over a total of 13 areas in the west of the country. It would be one of the largest Ukrainian air attacks on the Russian territory since the beginning of the war. Ukraine also reports the destruction of dozens of unmanned resources.

data.title: Bývalý ředitel ČT Dvořák má novou práci. Vede nadaci pro Vltavskou filharmonii
data.description: Bývalý generální ředitel České televize (ČT) Petr Dvořák je novým výkonným ředitelem nadačního fondu, který bude mít na starosti správu a shromažďování peněz na výstavbu Vltavské filharmonie. Ve středu o tom informoval server Mediář. Nová pražská dominanta u stanice metra C vyjde na 11,65 miliardy korun a má se začít stavět v roce 2027.
data.translatedTitle: Former director of CT Dvořák has a new job. He leads the Foundation for the Vltava Philharmonic
data.translatedDescription: Former CEO of Czech Television (CT) Petr Dvořák is the new Executive Director of the Endowment Fund, who will be in charge of the management and collection of money for the construction of the Vltava Philharmonic. On Wednesday, the server reported Mediář. The new Prague dominant at the metro station C costs 11.65 billion crowns and is to be built in 2027.

data.title: Ve Frýdku-Místku se tři lidé přiotrávili neznámou drogou, její původ zkoumá policie
data.description: Tři lidé se v úterý ve Frýdku-Místku přiotrávili neznámou drogou. Měli poruchy vědomí a silné křeče, všichni proto skončili ve vážném stavu v nemocnicích. Nyní jsou již mimo ohrožení života. Policie zjišťuje, o jakou látku by mohlo jít. Nic zatím nenasvědčuje tomu, že by šlo o nové syntetické opioidy, které se v Česku objevily.
data.translatedTitle: In Frýdek-Místek, three people pointed out with an unknown drug, its origin is examined by the police
data.translatedDescription: Three people on Tuesday in Frýdek-Místek pointed through an unknown drug. They had disorders of consciousness and severe convulsions, so they all ended up in a serious condition in hospitals. They are now out of life. The police find out what substance it could be. There is no indication of the new synthetic opioids that appeared in the Czech Republic.

data.title: Letošní MS v hokeji přilákalo k obrazovkám ČT sport téměř 5,5 milionu diváků
data.description: Letošní mistrovství světa v ledním hokeji oslovilo na ČT sport téměř 5,5 milionu diváků starších čtyř let. Nejsledovanějším přenosem se stalo čtvrtfinále Česka se Švédskem, které zasáhlo přes tři miliony fanoušků, oznámila Česká televize, která odvysílala všech 64 zápasů turnaje.
data.translatedTitle: This year's Hockey World Championship attracted almost 5.5 million viewers to CT Sport screens
data.translatedDescription: This year's Ice Hockey World Championship appealed to CT Sport almost 5.5 million viewers over four years of age. The most watched broadcast was the quarterfinals of the Czech Republic with Sweden, which hit over three million fans, announced Czech Television, which broadcast all 64 matches of the tournament.

data.title: Tramvaj ve Vršovicích srazila dívku, u místa nehody ležela koloběžka
data.description: U zastávky Nádraží Vršovice v Praze 10 dnes ráno srazila tramvaj dívku. Na místě zasahovali hasiči, policie záchranka. Sražená dívka je mimo ohrožení života, záchranářský sbor ji převezl do nemocnice. Provoz směrem do Nuslí stál zhruba čtvrt hodiny.
data.translatedTitle: The tram in Vršovice knocked down a girl, a scooter lay at the accident site
data.translatedDescription: At the stop Station Vršovice in Prague 10 this morning the tram knocked down a girl. Firefighters, an ambulance, intervened on the spot. The knocked girl is out of danger to life, the rescue corps transported her to the hospital. The operation to Nusle stood for about a quarter of an hour.

data.title: Žena, která vběhla s dětmi před trolejbus, dostala pokutu. Veřejný lynč mírnila policie
data.description: Žena, která v březnu v centru Ústí nad Labem vstoupila i se dvěma dětmi před rozjetý trolejbus, spáchala přestupek. Jak zjistil server iDNES.cz, za své počínání dostala několikatisícovou pokutu. Ve voze utrpělo následkem prudkého brzdění několik lidí zranění. Událost po zveřejnění vyvolala velkou diskusi, kterou se snažila usměrnit dokonce i policie.
data.translatedTitle: The woman who ran with the children before the trolleybus received a fine. Public lynch was moderated by the police
data.translatedDescription: A woman who entered in the center of Ústí nad Labem with two children before the trolleybus, committed an offense. As Idnes.cz found, she was fine for her actions. Several people suffered in the car as a result of severe braking. After publishing, the event caused a great discussion that even the police tried to direct.

data.title: Jižní Afrika mění zákon ve prospěch Starlinku. Ne kvůli Muskovi, dušuje se ministr
data.description: Jihoafrický ministr komunikace Solly Malatsi odmítl, že by vláda změkčovala pravidla kvůli firmě Skylink Elona Muska. Podle platné legislativy musí mít totiž poskytovatelé internetu v JAR alespoň 30 procent akcií ve vlastnictví černošských nebo jinak historicky znevýhodněných osob. Musk tato pravidla kritizoval s tím, že jako běloch nemá šanci licenci získat. Ministr ale popřel, že by plánované změny měly za cíl Muskovu firmu zvýhodnit.
data.translatedTitle: South Africa changes the law in favor of Starlink. Not because of Muska, the Minister is suffering
data.translatedDescription: South African Minister of Communication Solly Malatsi refused that the government would soften the rules due to Skylink Elon Muska. According to the legislation in force, Internet providers must have at least 30 percent of shares owned by black or otherwise historically disadvantaged persons. Musk criticized these rules with the fact that as a white man has no chance of obtaining a license. However, the minister denied that the planned changes should be favored by Muska's company.

data.title: Výbuch před přistáním a neotevřený poklop. SpaceX znovu testovala Starship
data.description: Společnost SpaceX v noci na středu provedla již devátý testovací let své největší lodi Starship, tentokrát v nové verzi. Při něm se měla pokusit o vypuštění maket družic Starlink. Již použitý nosič Super Heavy měl mezitím přistát do vody. Ani jeden z těchto cílů sice nebyl splněn, ale i tak firma získala data, které může využít při dalším testu.
data.translatedTitle: Explosion before landing and unopened hatch. SpaceX again tested Starship
data.translatedDescription: SPACEX on Wednesday night has already carried out the ninth test flight of its largest ship Starship, this time in a new version. It was supposed to try to release the dummy of Starlink satellites. Meanwhile, the Super Heavy carrier was supposed to land in the water. Neither of these objectives has been met, but even so, the company has obtained data that it can use in the next test.

data.title: Čína začíná kasírovat splátky půjček nejchudším zemím. Jde o stovky miliard
data.description: Nejchudší země na světě musí letos Číně vrátit 22 miliard dolarů (483 miliard Kč). Vyplývá to z analýzy australského výzkumného centra Lowy Institute. Jde o splátky půjček, které Čína těmto státům poskytla v rámci Iniciativy Nová hedvábná stezka. Role asijské velmoci v rozvojovém světě se tak podle analýzy změnila a chudé země tak místo nových čínských půjček splácejí Pekingu své dosavadní dluhy.
data.translatedTitle: China is starting to cashed the repayment of loans to the poorest countries. It is hundreds of billions
data.translatedDescription: The poorest country in the world must return $ 22 billion (CZK 483 billion) this year. This stems from an analysis of the Australian Research Center of the Lowy Institute. These are loan installments that China has provided to these countries as part of the new silk trail. The role of the Asian superpowers in the developing world has changed, according to the analysis, and the poor country will pay their previous debts instead of new Chinese loans.

data.title: Vláda má jednat o koncepci zahraniční politiky i nezákonných sterilizacích
data.description: Novou koncepci zahraniční politiky projedná vláda. Ministr zahraničí Jan Lipavský dříve poslancům řekl, že její součástí bude větší pozornost otázkám dodržování lidských práv a dlouhodobému podrývání mezinárodního práva a nedodržování závazků ze strany Ruska.
data.translatedTitle: The government is to negotiate the concept of foreign policy and unlawful sterilization
data.translatedDescription: The government will discuss the new concept of foreign policy. Foreign Minister Jan Lipavský previously told Members that it would be more attention to the issues of adherence to human rights and long -term undercovering international law and non -compliance with Russia's obligations.

data.title: Zelenszkij kitalálta a megoldást, Putyin és Trump is kell hozzá
data.description: Három éve folynak a harcok és nem látni a konfliktus végét.
data.translatedTitle: Zelensky invented the solution, Putin and Trump also need it
data.translatedDescription: For three years, fighting has been going on and not seeing the end of the conflict.

data.title: Kibertámadások: rettegnek a cégek, emelnek a biztosítók
data.description: A MI szintet lépett a vállalati visszaélések területén.
data.translatedTitle: Cyber ​​-attacks: Companies dread, raise insurers
data.translatedDescription: Mi levels in the field of corporate abuse.

data.title: Ingatlanbefektetések: eladási hullám jöhet a befektetési célra vásárolt lakásoknál?
data.description: Mára az ingatlanárak emelkedése nincs összhangban a bérleti díjak növekedésével, így alacsonyabb hozamra lehet szert tenni a lakáskiadásból.

data.title: Ucrânia. Zelensky propõe encontro trilateral com Trump e Putin
data.description: Volodymyr Zelensky propôs uma reunião trilateral com os homólogos norte-americano, Donald Trump, e russo, Vladimir Putin, para fazer avançar as negociações de paz sobre a guerra na Ucrânia, ao mesmo tempo que apelou a Washington para impor novas sanções contra Moscovo. A Rússia, por sua vez, disse que vai anunciar uma nova ronda de negociações diretas com a Ucrânia "em breve".
data.translatedTitle: Ukraine. Zelensky proposes trilateral meeting with Trump and Putin
data.translatedDescription: Volodymyr Zelensky proposed a trilateral meeting with US counterparts Donald Trump, and Russian, Vladimir Putin, to advance peace negotiations on Ukraine war, while appealing to Washington to impose new sanctions against Moscow. Russia, in turn, said it will announce a new round of direct negotiations with Ukraine "soon."

data.description: O Governo das Filipinas afirmou hoje, em comunicado divulgado pelo Departamento de Justiça, estar pronto para transferir Arnolfo Teves Jr., acusado pelas autoridades daquele país de ter assassinado 10 pessoas, e detido terça-feira em Díli.
data.translatedTitle: Philippines' government claims to be ready to transfer Arnolfo Teves Jr.
data.translatedDescription: The Philippine Government said today, in a statement issued by the Justice Department, to be ready to transfer Arnolfo Teves Jr., accused by that country's authorities of murdering 10 people, and detained Tuesday in Dili.

data.title: China recebe enviados de países insulares do Pacífico para reforçar influência
data.description: O ministro dos Negócios Estrangeiros da China, Wang Yi, recebe hoje os homólogos dos países insulares do Pacífico Sul, numa altura em que Pequim procura reforçar a influência sobre a região.
data.translatedTitle: China receives sent from Pacific's island countries to reinforce influence
data.translatedDescription: China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi today receives counterparts from the South Pacific's island countries, at a time when Beijing seeks to reinforce the influence on the region.

data.title: Advogado timorense de Arnolfo Teves Jr. apresenta pedido de habeas corpus
data.description: O advogado de defesa do político filipino Arnolfo Teves Jr., acusado pelas autoridades das Filipinas pelo assassínio de 10 pessoas e detido terça-feira em Díli, disse hoje que entrou com um pedido de habeas corpus no tribunal.
data.translatedTitle: Timorense lawyer by Arnolfo Teves Jr. fits habeas corpus
data.translatedDescription: Politician Filipino's defense lawyer Arnolfo Teves Jr., accused by the Philippines' authorities for the murder of 10 people and detained Tuesday in Dili, said today that he filed a request for habeas corpus in court.

data.title: Macau diz que jornalistas "não são exceção" à lei após detenção de repórteres
data.description: O secretário para a Segurança de Macau sublinhou hoje que os jornalistas "não são exceção" ao dever de cumprir a lei, depois da detenção de duas repórteres no parlamento local em 17 de abril.
data.translatedTitle: Macau says journalists "are no exception" to the law after detention of reporters
data.translatedDescription: The Secretary for Macao Security stressed today that journalists "are no exception" to the duty to comply with the law after the arrest of two reporters in the local parliament on April 17.

data.title: Trump oferece a Canadá proteção gratuita caso integre os EUA
data.description: O presidente dos Estados Unidos ofereceu ao Canadá proteção gratuita sob a "Cúpula Dourada", avançado sistema de defesa que planeia ter pronto em 2029, se o país se juntar aos Estados Unidos como 51.º estado.
data.translatedTitle: Trump offers Canada Free Protection If she integrates the USA
data.translatedDescription: The president of the United States offered Canada free protection under the "golden summit", advanced defense system that plans to have ready in 2029 if the country joins the United States as 51st.

data.title: Lula regressa ao trabalho após problema de saúde
data.description: O presidente brasileiro regressa esta quarta-feira ao trabalho, com viagens aos estados do Ceará e Pernambuco, após o seu estado de saúde o obrigar a cancelar o encontro de terça-feira com o presidente do Conselho Europeu, António Costa.
data.translatedTitle: Lula returns to work after health problem
data.translatedDescription: The Brazilian President returns this Wednesday to work, with trips to the states of Ceará and Pernambuco, after his health obligation to cancel the meeting on Tuesday with the president of the European Council, António Costa.

data.title: Goldman Sachs espera que yuan mais forte impulsione ações chinesas
data.description: As ações de empresas chinesas devem beneficiar com a valorização contínua da moeda chinesa, que tem demonstrado resiliência apesar das tensões comerciais com os Estados Unidos, indicou na terça-feira o banco de investimento norte-americano Goldman Sachs.
data.translatedTitle: Goldman Sachs expects Yuan stronger to boost Chinese actions
data.translatedDescription: The shares of Chinese companies should benefit from the continuous appreciation of Chinese currency, which has shown resilience despite commercial tensions with the United States, the US investment bank said on Tuesday.

data.title: Pequim tenta suspender venda de portos no Panamá
data.description: Pequim está a intensificar a pressão sobre o conglomerado de Hong Kong CK Hutchison Holdings para suspender a venda de dois portos próximos do Canal do Panamá a um consórcio liderado pela norte-americana BlackRock, informou a imprensa japonesa.
data.translatedTitle: Beijing tries to suspend port selling in Panama
data.translatedDescription: Beijing is intensifying the pressure on the Hong Kong Ck Hutchison Holdings conglomerate to suspend the sale of two ports near the Panama channel to a US-led consortium Blackrock, the Japanese press said.

data.translatedTitle: Mexico: Home full of corpses the authorities were found, gang battles scan
data.translatedDescription: At least 17 corpses were found in a abandoned house in Mexico, over 3,000 homicides in 2024.

data.title: Η Επίδαυρος έχει το δικό της lifestyle: ο «Λεωνίδας», η ντίσκο Capaki και οι «κοσμικές» παραστάσεις
data.description: Η Επίδαυρος είναι οι ηθοποιοί, οι σκηνοθέτες, οι παραστάσεις, το κοινό που σπεύδει κάθε Παρασκευή και Σάββατο του καλοκαιριού στο ιερό της αργολικής γης. Είναι όμως και ένας μικρόκοσμος με τη δική του μυθολογία και βέβαια με το δικό του lifestyle.
data.translatedTitle: Epidaurus has its own lifestyle: Leonidas, Capaki disco and "cosmic" performances
data.translatedDescription: Epidaurus is the actors, the directors, the performances, the audience that rushes every Friday and Saturday of the summer in the sanctuary of the Argolian land. But he is also a microcosm with his own mythology and of course with his own lifestyle.

data.title: 70 χρόνια Φεστιβάλ Αθηνών Επιδαύρου: Οι ξένοι σκηνοθέτες που έχουν συνδέσει το όνομά τους με την Επίδαυρο
data.description: Πέτερ Στάιν, Ρόμπιν Ουίλσον, Πίτερ Χολ και άλλοι σπουδαίοι διεθνείς σκηνοθέτες που αγάπησαν και αγαπήθηκαν από το κοινό της Επιδαύρου.
data.translatedTitle: 70 Years of Athens Epidaurus Festival: Foreign directors who have linked their name to Epidaurus
data.translatedDescription: Peter Stein, Robin Wilson, Peter Hall and other great international directors who loved and loved by the Epidaurus audience.

data.title: 70 χρόνια Επίδαυρος: οι παραστάσεις που δίχασαν και εκείνες που δίκασαν
data.description: Η Επίδαυρος έχει αναδειχθεί και σε πεδίο θεατρικών αντιπαραθέσεων. Από την πρώτη εμφάνιση γυμνού το 1982 μέχρι τις «Σφήκες» της Λένας Κιτσοπούλου το 2023, κάνουμε μια αναδρομή στις παραστάσεις που δίχασαν τους θεατές του Φεστιβάλ Αθηνών Επιδαύρου.
data.translatedTitle: 70 years of Epidaurus: The performances they divided and those who tried
data.translatedDescription: Epidaurus has also emerged in a field of theatrical controversy. From the first appearance naked in 1982 to the "wasps" of Lena Kitsopoulou in 2023, we take a look at the performances that divided the spectators of the Athens Epidaurus Festival.

data.title: Κατερίνα Ευαγγελάτου – ΒΗΜΑ Talks: «Δουλειά του Φεστιβάλ είναι και να ενοχλεί»
data.description: Η απερχόμενη καλλιτεχνική διευθύντρια του Φεστιβάλ Αθηνών-Επιδαύρου, Κατερίνα Ευαγγελάτου, κάνει στο ΒΗΜΑ Talks, έναν πρώτο απολογισμό της εξαετούς θητείας της, η οποία ολοκληρώνεται με την επέτειο συμπλήρωσης 70 ετών από την ίδρυση του Φεστιβάλ.
data.translatedTitle: Katerina Evangelatou - VIMA Talks: "Festival's work is and bothering"
data.translatedDescription: The outgoing artistic director of the Athens-Epidaurus Festival, Katerina Evangelatou, makes at VIMA Talks, a first account of her six-year term, which concludes with the 70th anniversary of the establishment of the Festival.

Η αντιπολίτευση αντιδρά, με το ΠαΣοΚ να έχει ήδη καταθέσει τη δική του πρόταση, ενώ ο ΣΥΡΙΖΑ σκοπεύει να ακολουθήσει, όπως και τα υπόλοιπα κόμματα, τα οποία όμως μέχρι στιγμής δεν διαθέτουν τον απαιτούμενο αριθμό υπογραφών.
data.translatedTitle: 5 in the morning: ND's proposal for pre -trial - The end of OPEKEPE - the approval of "Safe"
data.translatedDescription: The political debate on the tragedy in Tempi culminates after a proposal for a New Democracy pre -investigation. The opposition reacts, with PASOK already submitting its own proposal, while SYRIZA intends to follow, as well as the other parties, but so far do not have the required number of signatures.

data.title: Nets and high-tech hijackings: Anti-drone systems offer new ways to counter rising threats

data.title: Saudi Arabia’s annual inflation rate holds steady at 2.3% in April: GASTAT
data.description:
RIYADH: Rent increases and fuel price rises helped Saudi Arabia post an inflation rate of 2.3 percent in April — the same level as a year earlier — official data showed.

	According to the latest figures from the General Authority for Statistics, a 6.8 percent increase in the cost of housing, water, electricity, gas, and other fuels contributed to the rise.

	Within this category, rents paid for housing rose by 8.1 percent, driven by an 11.9 percent spike in apartment rental prices, a category that holds significant weight in the overall index.
data.translatedTitle: Saudi Arabia’s annual inflation rate holds steady at 2.3% in April: GASTAT
data.translatedDescription:

	Within this category, rents paid for housing rose by 8.1 percent, driven by an 11.9 percent spike in apartment rental prices, a category that holds significant weight in the overall index.

data.title: Haaland eyes FA Cup to save face after Man City’s ‘horrific’ season
data.description:
MANCHESTER: Erling Haaland said Manchester City must deliver in the FA Cup final on Saturday to salvage something from a “horrific” season that saw them deposed as English champions for the first time in five years.
	City face Crystal Palace at Wembley aiming to avoid a first trophyless campaign since Pep Guardiola’s debut season in charge in 2016/17.
	Guardiola’s men sit fourth in the Premier League, 18 points adrift of champions Liverpool, and in a battle just to secure a top-five finish and Champions League football next season in their final two league matches.

data.title: Ben Sulayem drives major improvements to FIA’s international Sporting Code
data.description: DUBAI: The Federation Internationale de l’Automobile, the global governing body for motor sport and the federation for mobility organizations worldwide, has announced that it is to make major improvements to Appendix B of its International Sporting Code following an extensive review commissioned by FIA’s President Mohammed Ben Sulayem.

data.title: Russian delegation arrives in Turkiye for Ukraine war talks
data.description:
ISTANBUL: Russia’s delegation arrived in Istanbul for peace talks with Ukraine, Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said Thursday, and a Ukrainian official said a delegation including President Volodymyr Zelensky was on its way the the Turkish capital Ankara.
	Russian President Vladimir Putin was not part of the delegation from Moscow, however, according to a list released by the Kremlin Wednesday night, prompting criticism from Western officials that the Kremlin isn’t serious about the peace effort.

data.title: Lufthansa group suspends Tel Aviv flights following Houthi attacks on Israel
data.description:
BERLIN: Airline group Lufthansa will suspend its flights to Tel Aviv through May 25, it said on Thursday, citing the “current situation.”
	This affects flights operated by Lufthansa, Swiss, Austrian Airlines, Eurowings, ITA Airways, Brussels Airlines and Lufthansa Cargo, it added.
	Global airlines have again halted their flights to and from Tel Aviv after a missile fired by Yemen’s Houthis toward Israel on May 4 landed near the country’s main international airport in Tel Aviv.

data.title: Al-Ain to host 6th IMMAF Youth World Championships in July
data.description:
ABU DHABI: The UAE Jiu-Jitsu and Mixed Martial Arts Federation has announced that the sixth IMMAF Youth World Championships will be held in Al-Ain Region for the first time from July 21-27.

	The tournament will be staged at the Al-Ain Convention Center with more than 1,000 male and female athletes from 60 countries competing in the championship’s largest event to date.

data.title: India says Pakistan nuclear arsenal should be under UN surveillance
data.description:
SRINAGAR: Pakistan’s nuclear arsenal should be brought under the surveillance of the UN’s nuclear agency, Indian Defense Minister Rajnath Singh said Thursday, following last week’s conflict between Islamabad and New Delhi.

	“I wanted to raise this question for the world: are nuclear weapons safe in the hands of a rogue and irresponsible nation?” Singh told troops at a base in Srinagar in Indian-administered Kashmir.

data.title: Madinah municipality continues intensive food safety inspections
data.description:
MADINAH: Food safety inspections have been stepped up ahead of the arrival of Hajj pilgrims, reported the Saudi Press Agency on Thursday.

	The Madinah Regional Municipality has carried out routine testing of commercial establishments, with 4,165 samples to date confirmed as conforming to approved standards. So far, 186 samples have been deemed unfit for human consumption.

data.title: Trump: India has offered US a trade deal with zero tariffs
data.description:
RIYADH: US President Donald Trump said on Thursday in Doha that India had offered the US a trade deal with zero tariffs.

	New Delhi is seeking to clinch a trade deal with the US within the 90-day pause on tariff hikes announced by Trump on April 9 for major trading partners, which had included a 26 percent tariff on India.

	“It is very hard to sell in India, and they are offering us a deal where basically they are willing to literally charge us no tariffs,” Trump said in a meeting with executives in Doha.
data.translatedTitle: Trump: India has offered US a trade deal with zero tariffs
data.translatedDescription:

data.title: Jordan evacuates second group of cancer patients from Gaza
data.description:
AMMAN: Jordan’s government on Wednesday began evacuating four child cancer patients and 12 family members from Gaza.

	They are the second group of patients evacuated for treatment under the Jordan Medical Corridor initiative, started in March this year, that aims to treat 2,000 Gazan children.

	The children and their families were evacuated by the Royal Jordanian Air Force in cooperation with the World Health Organization and the Ministry of Health.

	They will be treated at the King Hussein Cancer Center.

data.title: Cancer de la peau: l'OMS fait des révélations et avertit
data.description: Les mélanomes, des cancers de la peau particulièrement agressifs, sont en augmentation à l’échelle mondiale. Cette hausse est principalement due à des changements dans nos comportements, tels que la recherche d’un bronzage parfait, les voyages fréquents vers des destinations ensoleillées et une exposition prolongée aux rayons ultraviolets.
data.translatedTitle: Skin cancer: WHO makes revelations and warns
data.translatedDescription: Melanomas, particularly aggressive skin cancers are increasing worldwide. This increase is mainly due to changes in our behavior, such as the search for perfect tan, frequent trips to sunny destinations and prolonged exposure to ultraviolet rays.

data.title: Ce que risque Dagobert Nwafo, présumé assassin de Mathis, en détention à la prison de Kondengui
data.description: Après son inculpation le 27 mai 2025, le juge d’instruction près le tribunal de grande instance du Mfoundi a ordonné que Dagobert Nwafo soit placé sous mandat de dépôt à la prison centrale de Yaoundé. Deux semaines après avoir tué Mathis de coups de poignards, Dagobert Nwafo est placé en détention à la prison centrale de Kondengui à Yaoundé. Sur ordonnance et mandat du juge d’instruction près le tribunal de grande instance du Mfoundi, le magistrat Jean Daniel Lembe Toto, le commissaire central n°1 l’a déposé hier à la maison d’arrêt. Il y a passé sa première nuit et y restera jusqu’au 27 novembre 2025, date à laquelle le régisseur de prison le présentera au cabinet du juge d’instruction. Après l’enquête préliminaire, Dagobert Nwafo est inculpé « d’assassinat » et c’est à ce titre qu’il est poursuivi devant la justice camerounaise. L’infraction est prévue et punie par les articles 74 et 276 du Code pénal . Alors que l’article 74 donne les caractéristiques d’une personne pénalement responsable, l’article 276 traite de l’assassinat proprement dit. Aux termes de cet articles intitulé assassinat, « est puni de mort, le meurtre commis soit : a) avec préméditation, b) par empoisonnement, c) pour procéder au trafic des organes de la victime (…) ». Au terme de la procédure judiciaire, le tribunal prononcera le jugement dans lequel la condamnation définitive sera connue. Pour l’instant, au regard de l’inculpation, l’accusé risque la peine de mort. La procédure est parvenue à cette étape plus de deux semaines après la mort du petit Mathis dont le corps est scellé à la morgue. Dans une interview accordée à nos confrères de la CRTV télé, le préfet du Mfoundi a expliqué pourquoi les autorités ont pris 18 jours pour l’enquête préliminaire alors que toutes les preuves semblaient être réunies depuis la commission des faits. Emmanuel Mariel Djikdent a déclaré « qu’il y a des actes à poser avant pour que le dossier soit bien complet.  Je peux vous dire qu’il fallait quand même poser certains actes par des professionnels, notamment un médecin légiste qui devait faire l’autopsie ». Pendant ce temps, l’indignation de l’opinion montait. De nombreuses figures connues, en particulier de la scène musicale et de la défense des droits des femmes commençaient à crier à l’injustice et à demander la célérité dans le traitement du dossier de dagobert Nwafo. Son déferrement à la prison survient au lendemain de la descente devant le commissariat d’un groupe de femmes vêtues de noir en signe de protestation. Cet article Ce que risque Dagobert Nwafo, présumé assassin de Mathis, en détention à la prison de Kondengui est apparu en premier sur Journalducameroun.com .
data.translatedTitle: What Dagobert Nwafo risks, alleged assassin of Mathis, in detention in Kondengui prison
data.translatedDescription: After his charge on May 27, 2025, the investigating judge at the MFoundi tribunal de grande instance ordered that Dagobert Nwafo be placed under a deposit warrant at Yaoundé central prison. Two weeks after killing Mathis with daggers, Dagobert Nwafo is placed in detention at Kondengui central prison in Yaoundé. On the prescription and mandate of the investigating judge at the Mfoundi tribunal de grande instance, the magistrate Jean Daniel Lembe Toto, the central commissioner No. 1 put him yesterday at the remand center. He spent his first night there and will stay there until November 27, 2025, the date on which the prison manager will present him to the cabinet of the investigating judge. After the preliminary investigation, Dagobert Nwafo is charged "assassination" and it is in this capacity that he was prosecuted before the Cameroonian justice. The offense is provided for and punished by articles 74 and 276 of the Criminal Code. While article 74 gives the characteristics of a criminally responsible person, article 276 deals with the assassination proper. Under the terms of this articles entitled Assassination, "is punished with death, the murder committed either: a) with premeditation, b) by poisoning, c) to carry out the organs of the victim (...)". At the end of the legal proceedings, the court will pronounce the judgment in which the final conviction will be known. For the moment, with regard to charges, the accused risks the death penalty. The procedure has reached this stage more than two weeks after the death of little Mathis whose body is sealed in the morgue. In an interview with our colleagues from the CRTV Télé, the prefect of the MFoundi explained why the authorities took 18 days for the preliminary investigation when all the evidence seemed to be gathered from the fact commission. Emmanuel Mariel Djikdent said "that there are acts to be carried out before the case is complete.  I can tell you that we still had to take certain acts by professionals, including a medical examiner who was to do the autopsy. " Meanwhile, the indignation of opinion rose. Many known figures, in particular the music scene and the defense of the rights of women began to shout in injustice and to ask for speed in the processing of Dagobert Nwafo's file. His swapping in prison occurs the day after the descent before the police station of a group of women dressed in black as a sign of protest. This article What Dagobert Nwafo risks, presumed assassin of Mathis, in detention at Kondengui prison appeared first on Journalducameroun.com.

data.title: Une vingtaine d’acteurs judiciaires formés à l’expertise balistique et à la lutte contre la cybercriminalité à Beni
data.description: Une vingtaine d’acteurs de la justice militaire et de la police judiciaire de Beni, dans le Nord-Kivu, suivent simultanément deux formations distinctes depuis le lundi 26 mai, organisées par la section d’appui à la justice de la MONUSCO.
data.translatedTitle: About twenty judicial actors trained in ballistic expertise and the fight against cybercrime in Beni
data.translatedDescription: About twenty actors in military justice and the Beni judicial police, in North Kivu, simultaneously follow two separate formations since Monday, May 26, organized by the support section of the Monusco justice.

data.title: Nord-Kivu : le PAM s’engage à intensifier l’aide humanitaire aux déplacés
data.description: Le gouverneur du Nord-Kivu, Evariste Kakule Somo, a rencontré mardi 17 mai Cindy Hensley McCain, directrice exécutive du Programme alimentaire mondial (PAM), en visite de travail à Beni, chef-lieu provisoire de la province.
data.translatedTitle: North Kivu: PAM is committed to intensifying humanitarian aid to the displaced
data.translatedDescription: The Governor of North Kivu, Evariste Kakule Somo, met on Tuesday May 17 Cindy Hensley McCain, executive director of the World Food Program (PAM), on a working visit to Beni, provisional capital of the province.

data.title: Lancement de l'opération « NYUMBA KUMI » pour lutter contre l’insécurité à Kindu
data.description: Le gouverneur de la province du Maniema, Mussa Kabwankubi, a lancé, mardi 27 mai, l’opération « Nyumba Kumi » (dix maisons) afin de lutter contre la criminalité grandissante à Kindu. Cette initiative consiste à surveiller les mouvements de population par groupes de dix maisons voisines, avec pour objectif de maîtriser les déplacements des habitants et d’avoir une vue d’ensemble sur les activités menées dans chaque avenue.
data.translatedTitle: Launch of the "Nyumba Kumi" operation to combat insecurity in Kindu
data.translatedDescription: The governor of Maniema Province, Mussa Kabwankubi, launched, on Tuesday, May 27, the operation "Nyumba Kumi" (ten houses) in order to combat growing crime in Kindu. This initiative consists in monitoring population movements in groups of ten neighboring houses, with the aim of mastering the movements of the inhabitants and having an overview of the activities carried out in each avenue.

data.title: Infos 27 : « Kinshasa : 200 millions de dollars de la Banque mondiale pour renforcer l'assainissement »
data.description: Revue de presse kinoise du mercredi 28 mai 2025. La plupart des journaux parus ce mercredi reviennent sur la question de l’engagement du gouvernement et de ses partenaires dans l’assainissement de la ville-province de Kinshasa.
data.translatedTitle: Info 27: "Kinshasa: 200 million dollars from the World Bank to strengthen sanitation"
data.translatedDescription: Kinoise press review on Wednesday, May 28, 2025. Most of the newspapers published this Wednesday come back to the question of the commitment of the government and its partners in the sanitation of the city-province of Kinshasa.

data.title: Le chef milicien Libaya tué dans un affrontement entre deux factions de la milice Mobondo à Kwamouth
data.description: Le chef rebelle, colonel autoproclamé Libaya, affilié au groupe Mobondo dirigé par un certain Daddy, a été tué dimanche 25 mai lors d’affrontements entre deux factions rivales de cette milice au village Vilakata, près du pylône 100, à proximité de Kinsele, dans le territoire de Kwamouth, province du Mai-Ndombe. Plusieurs biens appartenant aux civils ont été pillés lors des heurts.
data.translatedTitle: The Libaya Milician Head killed in a confrontation between two factions of the Mibondo militia in Kwamouth
data.translatedDescription: The rebellious chief, Colonel self-proclaimed Libaya, affiliated with the Mobondo group led by a certain Daddy, was killed Sunday May 25 during clashes between two rival factions of this militia in the Vilakata village, near the pylon 100, near Kinsele, in the territory of Kwamouth, province of Mai-ndombe. Several goods belonging to civilians were looted during the clashes.

data.title: Bunia : lancement du projet Ensemble pour la stabilité de l’Est

data.title: Cedi to continue holding firm against dollar; one dollar going for GH¢11.80
data.description: Ghana’s foreign exchange reserves, excluding encumbered assets, increased by 63% month-on-month in April 2025, reaching US$7.92 billion, equivalent to 3.7 months of import cover. This was up from the US$7.26 billion (3.3 months of import cover) in March 2025.

data.title: Dietary Management of Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: A Ghanaian Perspective
data.description: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) is a complex endocrine disorder that affects an estimated 6–13% of women of reproductive age globally, making it one of the most common hormonal conditions in women today. PCOS may be underdiagnosed due to limited awareness and diagnostic capacity, and both anecdotal and clinical experience suggest it is increasingly recognised in health settings.

data.title: Suspenden sesión en el CN, la nueva convocatoria quedó en suspenso
data.description: Después de tres horas de espera, la sesión del Congreso Nacional no duró ni cinco minutos en un ambiente de tensión, hermetismo, misterio. El Hemiciclo mantuvo las puertas vedadas a los medios, pero los informes mostraban fuerte presencia de seguridad privada, lo que fue denunciada por los diputados de oposición. La oposición tenía lista una moción con alrededor de 74 diputados para aprobar el acta de la moción anterior, en virtud de que tenían informes que la Junta Directiva, quería aprobar convenios y préstamos internacionales metiendo en el fondo el presupuesto de las elecciones de noviembre del Consejo Nacional Electoral. La oposición exigía aprobar el acta y en una nueva sesión conocer y aprobar el presupuesto de 1,737 millones de lempiras que el CNE ha pedido para las elecciones de este año, según lo dio a conocer la consejera presidenta del Consejo Nacional Electoral (CNE), Cossette López. Diputados de la oposición están a la expectativa de ser convocados nuevamente, por lo que no quieren abandonar el Hemiciclo Legislativo, arguyendo que podría haber un “madrugón”. “Ahí están todos los de la bancada de Libre sentados, yo supongo que lo que quieren es que nos vayamos, convocar y aprobar esto sin el cuórum debido, otro madrugón”, manifestó Jorge Cálix , instando a presupuesto de elecciones.
data.translatedTitle: They suspend session in the CN, the new call was suspended
data.translatedDescription: After three hours of waiting, the National Congress session did not last even five minutes in an environment of tension, secrecy, mystery. The hemicycle kept the doors closed to the media, but the reports showed a strong presence of private security, which was denounced by opposition deputies. The opposition had a motion with around 74 deputies to approve the act of the previous motion, because they had reports that the Board of Directors wanted to approve international agreements and loans by putting in the background the budget of the November elections of the National Electoral Council. The opposition demanded to approve the minutes and in a new session know and approve the budget of 1,737 million lempiras that the CNE has asked for this year's elections, as announced by the president of the National Electoral Council (CNE), Cossette López. Opposition deputies are in expectation of being summoned again, so they do not want to abandon the legislative hemicycle, arguing that there could be an "early riser." "There are all the free bank sitting, I suppose that what they want is that we go, convene and approve this without the quorum due, another early morning," said Jorge Calix, urging election budget.

data.title: Lo matan después de recibir una llamada en Santa Bárbara
data.description: Edgar Valencia (de 25 años) apareció muerto la mañana de ayer en una desolada calle de la comunidad de Callejones , del municipio de Macuelizo , luego de salir de su casa tras recibir una llamada. Según explicaron familiares, Edgar Valencia salió temprano el lunes en su motocicleta desde su vivienda en la comunidad de Pueblo Nuevo, del municipio de Florido, Copán , adonde no regresó más. Lamentablemente dijeron que supieron de su muerte cuando la Policía reportó el hallazgo del cuerpo en Macuelizo y, al acudir, constataron que se trataba del joven. El reporte policial detalla que en la escena se encontró la motocicleta de Edgar Valencia , por lo que se descarta el robo como móvil del crimen. Dijeron que investigan el caso para dar con el paradero de los responsables.
data.translatedTitle: They kill him after receiving a call in Santa Barbara
data.translatedDescription: Edgar Valencia (25 years old) appeared dead yesterday in a desolate street in the community of Callejones, in the municipality of Macuelizo, after leaving his home after receiving a call. According to relatives, Edgar Valencia left early on his motorcycle from his home in the community of Pueblo Nuevo, in the municipality of Florido, Copán, where he did not return anymore. Unfortunately they said they knew about their death when the police reported the discovery of the body in Macuelizo and, when they came, they found that it was the young man. The police report details that Edgar Valencia's motorcycle was found in the scene, so theft is discarded as a mobile from the crime. They said they investigate the case to find the whereabouts of those responsible.

data.title: Xiomara Castro asume el mando de la Secretaría de Defensa y oficializa nuevos nombramientos
data.description: Tegucigalpa La presidenta de la República, Xiomara Castro , oficializó la noche de este martes el nombramiento de dos nuevos funcionarios en su gabinete. Dicha información la dio a conocer mediante su cuenta oficial de “X”, donde a su vez expresó que ella misma tomará el mando de la Secretaría de Defensa. “Las funciones de la Secretaría de Defensa Nacional serán asumidas por mi persona, en mi condición de comandanta general de las Fuerzas Armadas”, escribió la mandataria. El abogado Javier Efraín Bú Soto , actual embajador de Honduras en Estados Unidos, fue designado como nuevo secretario de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperación Internacional, en sustitución de Eduardo Enrique Reina , quien dejó el cargo para integrarse como designado presidencial. Por su parte, Longino Becerra será el nuevo titular de la Secretaría de Derechos Humanos , tras la salida de Angélica Álvarez, quien también se une a la campaña política en calidad de designada presidencial. “Agradezco profundamente a quienes han ejercido con responsabilidad y eficiencia estos altos cargos, brindando un valioso servicio a la patria”, declaró Castro. Las renuncias se producen a pocos días de cumplirse el plazo legal para que los funcionarios públicos que aspiran a cargos de elección popular abandonen sus puestos, tal como exige el artículo 240 de la Ley Electoral. La fecha límite es el 30 de mayo, exactamente seis meses antes de los comicios generales programados para el 30 de noviembre.
data.translatedTitle: Xiomara Castro assumes the command of the Secretariat of Defense and formalizes new appointments
data.translatedDescription: Tegucigalpa The President of the Republic, Xiomara Castro, formalized on Tuesday the appointment of two new officials in their cabinet. This information was released through her official "X" account, where she expressed that she will take command of the Secretariat of Defense. "The functions of the Ministry of National Defense will be assumed by me, in my status as a general command of the Armed Forces," the president wrote. The lawyer Javier Efraín Bú Soto, current Ambassador of Honduras in the United States, was appointed as the new Secretary of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, replacing Eduardo Enrique Reina, who left office to integrate as an presidential designated. For its part, Longino Becerra will be the new head of the Secretariat of Human Rights, after the departure of Angélica Álvarez, who also joins the political campaign as presidential designated. "I deeply thank those who have exercised with responsibility and efficiency these high positions, providing valuable service to the homeland," Castro said. The resignations occur a few days after the legal deadline for public officials who aspire to positions of popular election abandon their positions, as required by article 240 of the Electoral Law. The deadline is May 30, exactly six months before the general elections scheduled for November 30.

data.title: Cohep: Paralización en Choloma deja $33.8 millones de pérdidas diarias
data.description: Camiones cargados de granos básicos con daños, miles de personas y vehículos varados dejó una protesta de quienes invirtieron en la empresa Koriun y que ahora reclaman el dinero que el Gobierno les prometió pagar. El grupo de socios se apostaron en el puente El Kilómetro de Choloma, bloqueando el paso a los que se transportaban de San Pedro Sula a Puerto Cortés y a los que regresaban por más de cuatro horas. Durante el bloqueo, los manifestantes se enfrentaron a la Policía, que utilizó la tanqueta para tirarles agua y lanzaron gas lacrimógeno. Por más de 40 minutos, el grupo enardecido lanzó piedras a la Policía hasta que logró dispersarlos. Casi a las 12:00 m, el paso de vehículos pudo restablecerse, pero quedaron varios camiones con parte de los contenedores quemados. Unos que iban cargados de maíz y arroz y casi todo el producto quedó regado en la carretera. Ante los daños, la respuesta del gerente de Consejo Hondureño de la Empresa Privada (Cohep), Santiago Herrera, no se hizo esperar, expresando que la paralización de la vía en Choloma representa 33.8 millones de dólares de pérdidas diarias, equivalentes a casi 900 millones de lempiras. Dijo que al país en general y afecta también el clima de inversión, “quien se siente confiado en desarrollar sus actividades en un país que tienen tantos conflictos en marcha”. Ante el problema de Koriun, la empresa privada ha dado a conocer que el Estado debió proceder de inmediato a tomar acciones dentro del marco de la ley y cumplir con los procedimientos. Pero tras la intervención que hizo el Ministerio Público y la Comisión Nacional de Bancos y Seguros (CNBS), no pudieron garantizar el pago de capital a muchos de los socios con más de L428 millones que tenía Koriun en efectivo y en cuentas bancarias. El dinero quedó en manos del gerente Iván Velásquez, a quien dejaron solo en las oficinas y no garantizaron que devolviera el dinero a los clientes. Roberto Talavera, abogado defensor de Velásquez, indicó ofrecieron la colaboración para entregar el dinero a los inversionistas, pero la Fiscalía ofrece aceptar un procedimiento abreviado. Manifestó que en ese caso no se aceptaría el delito de lavado de activos.
data.translatedTitle: COHEP: PARALIAL IN CHOLOMA LEAVES $ 33.8 MILLION DAILY LOSSES
data.translatedDescription: Trucks loaded with basic grains with damage, thousands of people and stranded vehicles left a protest of those who invested in the Koriun company and now claim the money that the Government promised to pay. The group of partners bet on the bridge the kilometer of Choloma, blocking the passage to those transported from San Pedro Sula to Puerto Cortés and those who returned for more than four hours. During the blockade, the protesters faced the police, who used the tanqueta to throw water and launched tear gas. For more than 40 minutes, the informed group launched stones at the police until it managed to disperse them. Almost at 12:00 m, the passage of vehicles could be restored, but several trucks were left with part of the burned containers. Some that were loaded with corn and rice and almost the entire product was watered on the road. Given the damage, the response of the Honduran Council Manager of the Private Company (COHEP), Santiago Herrera, did not wait, expressing that the paralysis of the road in Choloma represents 33.8 million dollars of daily losses, equivalent to almost 900 million lempiras. He said that the country in general and also affects the investment climate, "who feels confident in developing their activities in a country that have so many conflicts underway." Given the problem of Koriun, the private company has announced that the State must immediately proceed to take actions within the framework of the law and comply with the procedures. But after the intervention made by the Public Ministry and the National Commission of Banks and Insurance (CNBS), they could not guarantee the payment of capital to many of the partners with more than L428 million that Koriun had in cash and in bank accounts. The money was in the hands of the manager Iván Velásquez, whom they left alone in the offices and did not guarantee to return the money to the clients. Roberto Talavera, a defense lawyer of Velásquez, said they offered the collaboration to deliver money to investors, but the Prosecutor's Office offers to accept an abbreviated procedure. He said that in that case the crime of money laundering would not be accepted.

data.title: Eduardo Reina renuncia al cargo de Secretario de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperación Internacional
data.description: Eduardo Enrique Reina ha renunciado este martes al cargo de Secretario de Estado en los Despachos de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperación Internacional , así lo dio a conocer él mediante sus redes sociales. Reina indica que su renuncia se debe a que tendrá el honor de acompañar a la abogada Rixi Moncada Godoy en su fórmula presidencial, de cara a las eleciones generales de diciembre. Señora Presidenta: Tengo el honor de dirigirme a usted, en ocasión de presentarle mi más profundo agradecimiento, por haberme concedido el privilegio de acompañarla en estos tres años y cuatro meses de su Gobierno del Socialismo Democrático, como su Secretario de Estado en los Despachos de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperación Internacional y apoyarla en la ejecución de su Política Exterior, al frente de la Cancillería hondureña. Ha sido una oportunidad única el haber contribuido en el desarrollo de los pilares fundamentales de su gestión en política internacional, poniendo el beneficio del Pueblo hondureño como objetivo fundamental y creando una actividad diplomática y consular en pro de nuestros compatriotas migrantes, con una atención más humana, profesional, eficiente, digna y respetuosa. Trabajamos en el afianzamiento de las relaciones con países amigos, y generamos mayor apertura y presencia internacional para nuestro país, fomentando el acercamiento a otras regiones del mundo. Pudimos avanzar exitosamente en los compromisos internacionales, logramos incrementos en la cooperación y la política exterior, fomentar nuestros productos y exportaciones, atraer inversiones y trabajar en los distintos temas y retos mundiales como el cambio climático y la lucha contra la pobreza y la desigualdad. Todo este proceso de relaciones externas se han construido sobre la base del respeto a nuestra soberanía, al Derecho Internacional y a los principios, de autodeterminación de los pueblos, no injerencia y no intervención en asuntos internos, promoviendo en todo momento la búsqueda de la paz y el diálogo. Cabe señalar que un logro fundamental ha sido lograr, bajo su liderazgo, recuperar la imagen de Honduras en el exterior después de 12 años y 7 meses de Narco-Dictadura. Esta ocasión, en un sentimiento agridulce por dejar su Administración, asumimos una nueva etapa para cumplir con los designios de nuestro Partido, Libertad y Refundación “Libre” y gracias al voto libre, democrático, soberano y transparente de nuestro Pueblo, tener el honor de acompañar a la abogada Rixi Moncada Godoy en su fórmula presidencial. En esta nueva etapa política lucharemos para dar continuidad a todos los logros que usted ha llevado a cabo y lograr el triunfo y continuar en el proceso de Refundación de la Patria. En este sentido, me permito presentar ante usted mi renuncia irrevocable a partir del día miércoles 28 de mayo de 2025 , al cargo de Secretario de Estado en los Despachos de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperación Internacional. Acepte señora presidenta, las seguridades de mi más alta consideración y aprecio.
data.translatedTitle: Eduardo Reina resign from the position of Secretary of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation
data.translatedDescription: Eduardo Enrique Reina has resigned on Tuesday to the position of Secretary of State in the Foreign Relations and International Cooperation offices, he announced it through his social networks. Reina indicates that his resignation is because he will have the honor of accompanying lawyer Rixi Moncada Godoy in her presidential formula, in the face of the general election of December. Mrs. President: I have the honor of addressing you, on the occasion of presenting my deepest thanks, for having granted me the privilege of accompanying her in these three years and four months of her government of democratic socialism, such as your secretary of state in the offices of Foreign Relations and International Cooperation and support it in the execution of its foreign policy, in front of the Honduran Foreign Ministry. It has been a unique opportunity to have contributed to the development of the fundamental pillars of their management in international politics, putting the benefit of the Honduran people as a fundamental objective and creating a diplomatic and consular activity in favor of our migrant compatriots, with more human, professional, efficient, decent and respectful attention. We work in the consolidation of relations with friendly countries, and generate greater opening and international presence for our country, promoting the approach to other regions of the world. We were able to advance successfully in international commitments, we achieved increases in cooperation and foreign policy, encourage our products and exports, attract investments and work on the different world issues and challenges such as climate change and the fight against poverty and inequality. This whole external relations process has been built on the basis of respect for our sovereignty, international law and principles, self -determination of peoples, not intervention and non -intervention in internal matters, promoting at all times the search for peace and dialogue. It should be noted that a fundamental achievement has been to achieve, under its leadership, recover the image of Honduras abroad after 12 years and 7 months of narco-dictatorship. This occasion, in a bittersweet feeling for leaving its administration, we assume a new stage to comply with the designs of our party, freedom and “free” recast and thanks to the free, democratic, sovereign and transparent vote of our people, to have the honor of accompanying lawyer Rixi Moncada Godoy in her presidential formula. In this new political stage we will fight to give continuity to all the achievements that you have carried out and achieve triumph and continue in the process of re -founding the homeland. In this sense, I allow myself to present to you my irrevocable resignation as of Wednesday, May 28, 2025, to the position of Secretary of State in the Offices of Foreign Relations and International Cooperation. Accept Lady President, the assurances of my highest consideration and appreciation.
